ios.subtitle: Fun Word Game to Challenge You
Heads up for party fun coming!

editorialNotes.tagline: Do you want to buy a vowel?
editorialNotes.standard:
What’s so fun about spinning that wheel? Our three favorite things:
1. Lightning-fast rounds make for the perfect quick-fix word game.
2. Playing friends head to head is irresistible. So is building puzzles for them to solve.
3. We never get tired of solving puzzles at the last second and winning bonus rounds.

editorialNotes.tagline: Make it a true Daily Double

ios.subtitle: Fun game for girls and boys

editorialNotes.standard: Whether playing in the same room or remotely, passions can run wild while trying to get everyone to agree in Wavelength. The more people playing, the better, as you’ll find little consensus on how, say, roller coasters rank on a scale from thrilling to terrifying. You might even learn something new about your friends. We all agree on one thing, though: It’s one of the best party games we’ve played.
